message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for a very reasonable price of $12,000. I believe it will be highly valuable to you.
I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective. How about we meet halfway at $10,500? This product truly holds significant value.
I appreciate your willingness to meet halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to meet you at $9,500. Would you consider that price?
